1131.content:
Lita felt her clothing getting tighter on her, wiggling her toes in her suddenly far-too-tight shoes. She watched as the ceiling became closer and closer, then had to duck her head in order to avoid hitting it. She saw her muscles, already above-average, increase in mass. Finally, she stopped growing, left in nothing more than her bra and panties, at 15 feet tall.

"This is so incredible!" Lita exclaimed. "Now I can defeat anyone and become the first-ever female World Heavyweight Champion!"

She looked down at her incredible body that towered over the room, and then realized that there was a whole bottle of the white stuff next to the cup it was poured in. An idea soon came to her head.

"Hmm....maybe I should give some of this stuff to the other divas and we could create our own stable of amazons, to turn the tables on the male RAW wrestlers who have pushed us around all these years! On the other hand, maybe it's a better idea to just keep it all for myself...."

choices: Use her feet to toy with him
12531.content:
Seth loved Becky but sometimes she could be too much to say the least. Too demanding, controlling, and or playful. Today had been one such day.

"Oh come on, just give them a quick kiss." Becky said smiling with her feet on his lap.

"No, you're already pushing your luck with having me massage them. And what even is my reward for this?" He said growing kind of irritated.

"Oh you'll find out soon enough don't you worry. Just keep rubbing, my match was tiring, a lotta sweat built up in those boots." Becky had "forgot" to bring socks and more than one pair of shoes for this very long tour. And the one who had to share a bus with her was unfortunately, Seth Rollins. Eventually, Becky wanted to test her limits. She quickly launched her foot up to his mouth making him "kiss" her foot.

Seth immediately shot up and wiped furiously at his mouth trying to get rid of the awful taste. Becky just laughed and watched Seth run off to the bathroom to wash the taste out.

Little did he know, Becky followed him and unveiled his "reward." Without him noticing, she pulled out a little ray gun and used to shrink him down to only a few inches. "SURPRISE!! I found this bad boy for kinda cheap all things considered. And it has the power to shrink or grow anyone of my choosing. Isn't that awesome!!"

Seth looked up at his now giant girlfriend in fear, amazement, and confusion. "Aw, speechless are we? How about this." Becky then proceeded to_________.
12531.title: A Tiny Seth

125311.content:
"My feet didn't like how you ran off like that, how about you make it up to them with a few kisses?" Becky then showed her sole to Seth, almost taunting him.

Seth snapped out of his daze when the intensified smell of feet hit his noise and he realized his situation. "No, now grow me back and let's just forget this happened."

Becky merely chuckled and responded, "Wow BIG man calling the shots now? Come here," she then scooped him up with her toes so his upper half was above her toes.

Seth didn't even have time to react to the smell as he started to understand who he was at the mercy of, "Woah Becky, let's uh calm down, no need to-"

Becky didn't wait for him to finish as she started shaking her foot around sending Seth on a wild and terrifying ride. Becky laughed as Seth screamed. Becky eventually had her fun and started walking to the couch, squishing Seth's lower half.

Once she got there and sat down, she let him go. He gasped for air as she smiled down at him. Without wasting anymore time, she placed her foot on top of Seth, covering him in her nasty foot sweat while making him breathe in her foul foot odor.

She began rolling her foot over the tiny guy and enjoying the feel of it. His screams were met with mouths full of foot flesh and sweat and he had no time to spit it out. She stopped when his face was pressing into her sole. "If you want this to stop, start kissing." Seth immediately started kissing her feet vigorously, wanting out of this Hell. "Now...lick them." Seth couldn't bring himself to do it as even kissing her foot left a horrible taste. And not to mention the dirt and gunk that had built up.


"More fun for me then." Becky then rolled him to her toes and toyed with him that way, squeezing, rubbing his face with her big toe, switching feet, an Seth was regretting not licking.

Then she stopped, Seth waited underfoot for what was to come next.
125311.title: Becky uses Seth as a foot toy

125312.content:
Becky scooped up Seth in a fist ad began to uselessly struggle causing Becky to laugh. "There's no getting out of my fist little man, try all you want." She thought about what to do for a moment before coming up with an idea. "If you thought my feet were bad, maybe I can introduce you to something worse. Then you can appreciate them."

Seth's confusion, as he thought nothing could be worse than her feet, quickly turned to horror as she lifted up her arm and unveiled a bare armpit as she was wearing a tank top. "You can't be serious? J-just grow me back and I'll massage, kiss, and do whatever you want to your feet."

"You're gonna do that anyway. Stick your tongue out for me by the way, as a way to show your gratefulness." Seth screamed as his face was slammed into her rank armpit, getting an unwilling taste of her stale sweat. And God the smell was horrendous. Her body odor was horrid and he wondered how he didn't notice it more before.

Or he would if he could focus as Becky dragged him all over her arm pit. "This is too much fun, my other one is getting lonely though, how about you go and say hello." She then switched the hand she was holding him with and rubbed him against her other armpit and the Hell repeated.

After what felt like forever, she stopped and set him down on the sink. He gasped for air as he enjoyed the fresh air, not focusing on his giant girlfriend. Meanwhile Becky,_________.

1. Got some tape, Seth was going nowhere for a while.

2. Got actual deodorant and tape. Round 2?

3. Other
125312.title: Human Deodorant

info.brief_description: Women from WWE and other wrestling promotions grow into giantesses!
info.description:
In this story, the women of the WWE and other wrestling promotions become giantesses. You can do growth or shrink (although I prefer growth, that's just me personally) as long as it's a woman growing and a man shrinking.

No male growth or female shrinking. No gay stuff (lesbian is OK by me though). No toilet crap.

Anything else is okay. Please contribute to mine and I'll contribute to yours, thanks!
